product_name: REI Classic Duffel Bag - XXX Large
long_description: Behold the behemoth: our XXX Large REI Classic duffel bag boasts an expansive 10,700 cu. in. of gear-swallowing capacity and comes with a convenient compact storage sack for good measure. Urethane-coated 1,000-denier nylon is highly water resistant and very tough; dual zippers facilitate easy access into main compartment. Wrap-around 2 in. nylon webbing handles support the load. Tote duffel bag comfortably with the adjustable shoulder strap, included. Convenient storage sack doubles as a toiletry bag.
short_description: Behold the behemoth: our XXX Large REI Classic duffel bag boasts an expansive 10,700 cu. in. of gear-swallowing capacity and comes with a convenient compact storage sack for good measure.
